resource.chars:
15 Harley Street 
June 18/56
My dear Sharkey
I have carefully gone 
over Raineys Specimens 
& have arrived at a very 
different opinion as to the 
merits of his paper to that I 
previously entertained. He 
makes out quite to my 
satisfaction the fact of the 
development into a Cysticercus 
of the curious setose 
gregariniform creature 
described
